name: Anime: World War II
summary: In this third-person WWII-themed shooter H.E.N.T.A.I. battalion is on a huge mission of clearing out the fallen city from enemies. There are a couple of winning strategies you might want to choose depending on the type of weapon in your hands. Choose wisely: there is no map of what's left of the city, and there is little to no information about how much enemies left.
